section:
You are on the road between the Citadel of Velis Corin and Fort Mereth. This is quite rarely travelled - the military guardposts are few and far between. .
Lose 10 Shards gambling (if you have it)
Nothing happens
A sweet spring heals you of up to 3 Stamina points
When you are ready, you can:
Go to Disaster Bay Head for the Citadel of Velis Corin Travel to Fort Mereth Go south west into wild country
